channel.title: Jump-start the World on MyThinkPond
channel.description: Recent content in Jump-start the World on MyThinkPond

item.title: After COVID-19: Rebuilding America (and the World) - Starts With You Today
item.description: tl;dr COVID-19 has impacted all of us in some shape or form. The time to rebuild America (and the World) starts today with each and every one of us. It is time to wake the sleeping giant in each and everyone of us and do our part in this RECOVER - REBOOT - REBUILD process. Today, (as I reflect on the pandemic) I am constantly reminded that we are yet to see the peak of this impact; with no end at sight, no light at the end of the tunnel, no reason yet to celebrate.
